description: Smallest k such that n/k is a Fibonacci number.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n)=n/A054494(n). [Corrected by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 05 2014]
example: a(10)=2 because 10/1=10 is not a Fibonacci number but 10/2=5 is.
prog: (PARI) A010056(n)=my(k=n^2); k+=(k+1)<<2; issquare(k) || (n>0 && issquare(k-8))a(n)=fordiv(n,d,if(A010056(n/d), return(d))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 05 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 04 2000
extensions: a(34), a(55), a(68) corrected by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 06 2014
